title: Affordable Luxury: 4-Bedroom Home You Don’t Want to Miss!
description:
St. Francis Hills is a newly developed subdivision nestled in the serene hills of Consolacion, Cebu. Surrounded by natural landscapes, it offers a peaceful and harmonious community where neighbors live in quiet simplicity and comfort. This gated subdivision enjoys a unique geographical advantage, ideally situated between Consolacion and Talamban. It offers easy access to key establishments such as SM Consolacion, Sacred Heart School – Ateneo de Cebu, the University of San Carlos, and North General Hospital.

Originally priced at ₱7.9 million, now available for only ₱6.5 million — a rare opportunity you won't want to miss!

**Payment Options:**

**Option 1:**
- Spot Cash: ₱3,000,000
- Remaining ₱3,500,000 to be paid (W/out Interest) in 5 years with post-dated checks

**Option 2:**
- 10 Years Rent-to-Own: ₱500,000 downpayment, ₱65,000 monthly
- 15 Years Rent-to-Own: ₱500,000 downpayment, ₱50,000 monthly

No loan? No problem! With our special Rent-to-Own deal, no bank approval is needed.
